description:
after node reboot, i have tried manually to (re)start instances. but they failed to reboot.

root@node3:~# euca-describe-instances i-2hhxhj
RESERVATION	r-ej85m0n7	peproj
INSTANCE	i-2hhxhj	ami-tiny	10.0.0.22	10.0.0.22	running 	test (peproj, node3) 	0 	m1.small 	2010-12-20 22:00:46
root@node3:~# euca-reboot-instances i-2hhxhj
INSTANCE	i-2hhxhj
root@node3:~# euca-describe-instances i-2hhxhj
RESERVATION	r-ej85m0n7	peproj
INSTANCE	i-2hhxhj	ami-tiny	10.0.0.22	10.0.0.22	shutdown 	test (peproj, node3) 	0 	m1.small 	2010-12-20 22:00:46
title: manually running euca-reboot-instances  fails after node reboot

comments.content:

comments.content: Looks like this was committed to trunk.
